kw.name: Get Capabilities
kw.msg: &{cap} = { platformName=ios | platformVersion=14.4 | deviceName=iPhone 11 | bundleId=com.takealot.iphone.dev | automationName=XCUITest | fullReset=False | autoAcceptAlerts=True | newCommandTimeout=60 | noReset...

kw.name: Log Many
kw.doc: Logs the given messages as separate entries using the INFO level.

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias |
